items.name: C+R Confirmation
items.description: Close+retest confirmation (price closed below level, retested, confirmed breakdown)

items.name: RSI Level Check
items.description: Current RSI level (>80 or <20 = divergence risk)

items.name: 127% / 168% Extension Area
items.description: At Fib extension targets? (reversal zones / stop placement)

items.name: Divergence Present?
items.description: Price making higher high, but RSI/momentum lower = bearish divergence
items.notes: Bearish divergence confirmed - price higher but RSI declining ✓

items.name: VWAP Extension Trigger
items.description: VWAP script yellow/orange/red arrows = mean reversion opportunity

items.name: EMA Filter
items.description: 5-min 200 EMA: must be falling for shorts, rising for longs

items.name: Volume ≥ 1.3× 20-bar avg
items.notes: Volume spike confirmed on move - conviction present ✓

items.name: ADD Confirmation
items.description: Advance-Decline line: improving for longs, declining for shorts

items.name: Signal Tier ≥ MODERATE
items.description: Market signal must be MODERATE or higher

items.name: Higher TF Alignment
items.description: Aligned with daily/weekly trend? Or counter-trend?

items.name: Volatility Pattern
items.description: Market regime: consolidation/squeeze? Breakout? Expanding volatility?

items.name: At 127%-168% Extension?
items.description: Price extended to 127% or 168% Fib extension of prior move

items.name: Bearish Divergence Confirmed?
items.description: Price at extension making higher high, but RSI/momentum lower

items.name: VWAP Yellow/Orange/Red Arrow?
items.description: VWAP script arrow signal = mean reversion trigger

items.name: 50%-61.8% Pullback Identified?
items.description: After selling extension, calculate where 50%-61.8% pullback would be

items.name: Hard Level Confluence Present?
items.description: Does 50%-61.8% zone hit HARD LEVEL? (weekly/monthly high/low, support/resistance, EMA)

items.name: Risk Calculated ($231 max)
items.description: Position sized for $231 risk (1% of account). Stop pre-set. Capital verified.

wingman_commentary:
✓ RSI Level Check: RSI at 80 - extreme overbought territory
✓ Divergence: Bearish divergence confirmed - price higher but RSI declining
✓ Volume: Volume spike confirmed on move

[3/15 conditions passing - 20% complete]

Setup showing early strength. Momentum failure and overbought signal confirmed. Need more confluences to reach GREEN LIGHT.
